net.sf.JRecord.def.IO.builders

Interface IIOCopybookProvider


  • public interface IIOCopybookProvider
    Interface to create IOBuilders the use a RecordEditor-Xml file schema 
         IIOBuilder ioBldr = JRecordInterface1.SCHEMA_XML
                                          .newIOBuilder(xmlSchemaName);
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Method Detail

      • newIOBuilder

        IFileIOBuilder newIOBuilder(java.lang.String schemaFileName)
        Create a new RecordEditor-Xml IOBuilder for a file.
        Parameters:
        schemaFileName - name of the RecordEditor-Xml file name (or schema file). These are the default values (which can be overriden with the appropriate set* method
        Returns:
        requested IOBuilder

      • newIOBuilder

        IFileIOBuilder newIOBuilder(java.io.InputStream schemaStream,
                          java.lang.String schemaName)
        Create a new IOBulder for a RecordEditor-Xml stream.
        Parameters:
        schemaStream - stream to read the file-Schema from.
        schemaName - name of the File-Schema. These are the default values (which can be overriden with the appropriate set* method
        Returns:
        requested IOBuilder
